title: Beachfront Land in Rekawa Tourism Area
details:
Prime 3.5 acres land in Tangalle,Rekawa. It face to famous beautifull Rekawa beach in sri lanka & Located near the rekawa lagoon. There is a calm and quiet environment, close to the rekawa turtle watch and turtle point, This land is situated on the Rekawa tourism zone, This land is suitable for tourism hotel project. 3km to colombo-hambantota main road, 12 minutes drive to Tangalle town, very well road access. water/electricity available.
* very clear deed.

Contact for mor details 0766866799
